triggeredEntityDefinition.name: *Error Rate at 1.0% or higher, 03% is the normal

name: *Error Rate at 1.0% or higher, 03% is the normal
description:
AppDynamics has detected a problem with Application de-Production.
*Error Rate at 1.0% or higher, 03% is the normal downgraded in severity and is now warning.
All of the following conditions were found to be violating
For Application de-Production:
1) Higher than usual error rate
Higher than usual error rate's value 0.90 was greater than the threshold 0.70 for the last 10 minutes
